thread.title: Close to train station, gd service
thread.title_full: Close to train station, gd service - Review of Starhotels Metropole, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: karanganju88
title: Close to train station, gd service
text: Rome was the last leg of our 2 weeks long trip. We had accidentally booked a smaller room, but the staff at the front desk was sweet enough to assist us in getting an upgrade. room was comfortable size,neat and clean. breakfast the spread was gd a lavish. its walking distance to termini station.
